blog.name: jonerystogether
blog.title: Let It Be Fear
blog.description: 21 | English | life basically revolves around the jonerys | #jonerystrash till the day I die

body:
GoT rant

I’m not being funny but it’s the LAST EVER SEASON of Game of Thrones in a few months, why is there still people out there licking the arses of characters and hating on others?? Yeah have your favs, have your ships but have them without shitting on other people’s favs and ships. This is the time we as a fandom should be coming together to see off Thrones with mutual love and andmiration for the show, not hating each other just because they like different characters, GoT wouldn’t be GoT without EVERY SINGLE CHARACTER, good, bad or evil. So people need to grow up and stop being petty because once Thrones is gone, it’s fucking gone and the lasting taste of this amazing creation shouldn’t be tainted cause it’s fans can’t get along.

summary: ESSOS-AU + Lyanna, Arthur and lil’ Jon (5 years old), where everybody survives and lives freely far from Westeros’ mess: a...
caption:
ESSOS-AU + Lyanna, Arthur and lil’ Jon (5 years old), where everybody survives and lives freely far from Westeros’ mess: a little cottage a few miles from the ruined city of Sarhoy, a life of fishing and travelling and sword fighting lessons, with a little vegetable garden and a white mare… I wanted to draw something happy :) so here a nice day at the beach on the Orange Coast ☀️🏖️

[ click here for bigger/uncropped version ]

summary: Now that it seems obvious that they are so many callback moments that are going to occur, I honestly believe that episode 1 of...
body: Now that it seems obvious that they are so many callback moments that are going to occur, I honestly believe that episode 1 of season 8 is going to hit us with a major twist right off the gate just like episode 1 of season 1! I think the show is taking the season 1 callbacks very seriously as they should so that the story can wrap up nicely. It might be related to Jon and Sansa or it might not be but either way whatever they do it will be a major shock to our system and will set the season off right!!

summary:
Flowers of Love & Forgiveness
- Summary -
Jon’s parentage and identity is revealed and he doesn’t really know how to deal with...
body:
Flowers of Love & Forgiveness

- Summary -

Jon’s parentage and identity is revealed and he doesn’t really know how to deal with the news so he avoids everyone, including Dany, leaving her feeling lonely and sad without him. Thankfully with a nudge from two scaly friends, Jon comes to his senses and goes to her.

- Notes -

Here’s PART 2 of my Flowers for His Queen series. Revamped, reposted with a spangly new moodboard~ The other parts of this series will be coming some time in the future! >3<

Endless kudos to my partner @midqueenally ;). I love you to the moon and back! 

- Preview -

Dany heaved a sigh, as she sat on the fur rug by the fire watching the flames flicker in the hearth of her chamber at Winterfell.

They hadn’t spoken for five days now. They saw each other, sat next to each other everyday at strategy meetings but it didn’t feel the same anymore. When she tried initiating a conversation, he barely spoke a few words in reply. It didn’t even feel like he was speaking with her at all. He was so formal and emotionless and cold. When they passed each other in the hallways, he wouldn’t even look her in the eye.

His eyes were everything to her. Even with a room full of people, where physical contact was impossible, they always communicated without a word with their eyes. His brown expressive orbs contrasted so much with his impassive face. They spoke volumes. They told her everything about him, what he was feeling, what he was thinking. In his eyes she saw love.

She missed his presence, his voice and his touch. She missed him. It felt as if there was a gaping chasm between them, the connection tethering their hearts together felt frayed, severed. When Bran told them the truth about Jon’s parentage, identity and his birthright, she was astounded at the revelation. One word kept resounding in her head.

Targaryen.

The rest of this fic can be read on Ao3.

summary: Ok and Now Two the most strongest ASOIAF/GOT character Arya and Dany are same place. I am so happy that this beautiful and sweet...
body:
Ok and Now Two the most strongest ASOIAF/GOT character Arya and Dany are same place. I am so happy that this beautiful and sweet fandom has absolutely beautiful relationship. We all know who they are. I always know that Sansa fans hated Dany and Arya… today everything is confirmed.

Why?

Because Arya smiles to Dragons and she is happy to see them. Because it confirmed that NO ONE and Mother Of Dragons will be friends. Friends and special persons of Jon Snow’s life. They hate it. Sansa fans hates Arya because she isn’t hate Dany and Targaryens. She isn’t looking same cold and lier face as Sansa .

Sansa fans called Dany : Mad, Cruel, Dark, Tyran and many things

Now They are Calling Arya : Idiot child, coldheart killer, she likes Dany because she is killer like her, Arya doesn’t deserve to be part of house Stark and pack.

Bravo guys. You all show us your real face now 👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽

Just wait their hate posts after trailer comes and Jonerys confirms again. This people will be really in madness.


Arya and Dany belongs each Other ❤️The Dragon and The Wolf ❤️

Now They are Calling Arya : Idiot child, coldheart killer, she likes Dany because she is killer like her, Arya doesn’t deserve to be part of house Stark and pack.

Bravo guys. You all show us your real face now 👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽

Just wait their hate posts after trailer comes and Jonerys confirms again. This people will be really in madness.


Arya and Dany belongs each Other ❤️The Dragon and The Wolf ❤️
